name: Wally Walrus Pirogi Delivery Service
description:
Overview

You are the walrus Wally, a delivery animal who drives around on a scooter delivering Pirogies to towns. You haven't eaten in a while, so it wouldn't hurt to eat a few of the pirogies... right?

Game was made during a 7 day "GameJam" at the game development school FutureGames, with the purpose of being shown at Nordsken; a gaming event in northern Sweden for random people to try out.

How to play

Mouse - Navigate in menus
W & A keys - Move left and right
Space - Jump

Details

Team size: 5
My role: Programmer, Game designer
Duration: 7 days
Engine: Unity
